Bash("C:\Program Files\Git\usr\bin\ssh.exe" -p 65002 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no u492735793@157.173.209.161 "cd domains/greenofig.com/public_html && cat > .htaccess << ''HTACCESS_END''
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteBase /
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
  RewriteRule ^ index.html [L]
</IfModule>

<IfModule mod_headers.c>
  # Normal cache for assets
  Header set Cache-Control ""max-age=3600, must-revalidate""
  
  # Short cache for HTML  
  <FilesMatch ""\.(html|htm)$"">
    Header set Cache-Control ""no-cache, must-revalidate""
  </FilesMatch>
  
  # Deployment timestamp
  Header set X-Deployment-Time ""2025-11-19-06:31:00""
</IfModule>
HTACCESS_END
echo ''âœ… Updated .htaccess with normal caching''")
